title: Savasana's Kiss: A Yoga Love Story
description: Sean is a handsome business executive, struggling with anxiety and seeking answers.Alex is a beautiful yoga teacher, driven by the spiritual aspects of her craft.When you finally meet your soulmate staring back at you...Do you keep your vows?Or do you break them? Stretching the traditional boundaries of the romance genre, the novel deals with transcendent themes that relate to our very existence and what it truly means to be in love.At its core, SAVASANAâ€™S KISS is the story of two people on a path of self-discovery, searching for a deeper understanding of life and the universal spirit that resides in all of us.AWARDS:NIEA, Finalist (Erotica, 2018).NGIBA, Finalist (Romance, 2019). (less)
author: R.C. Robbin
